title: Update
body: Ok so, I play on EUNE and NA. But lately I have been playing only on EUNE, and today I wanted to go to NA to play with some old friends. But when I changed the server it started updating again even tho league of legends was updated when I played on EUNE. My question is, why would you force me to download 3500MB of update just because its a different server and everything else (mostly everything else) is the same? {{champion:266}}

replies.body: The main reason is just like you said, it's a different server and *mostly* everything is the same. There are a good amount of files that need to be swapped out depending on the languages available in the region you switched too. With region switches, the main files being changed are language files.
